about_the_game:
Welcome to Cozy Beach, where you can explore a cozy tropical island with your feline friends!

😸 Customize an adorable avatar and dress them up with lots of stylish options.

🎣 Go fishing and try to collect every fish - some might take a couple players to catch!

🔎 Discover treasure maps and hunt for treasure- what kind of cool stuff will you find?

🍍 Collect fruits, and craft fun and silly tropical drinks from the friendly capybara barkeep - the rarer the ingredients, the more exotic the drink!

⭕  Go water tubing in a lazy river around the beautiful tropical island to take in the sights.

🎶 Jam out to sweet tunes on the radio!

And of course, no day at the beach is complete without hanging out and chatting with your friends 👯‍♂️ 

Cozy Beach can be played co-op locally, or online with friends- join up with other players to get 100% completion!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better

short_description: Cozy Beach lets you relax at an adorable cozy twilight beach solo or with your friends. Catch and collect fish, search for treasure, craft tropical drinks, go water tubing around the island - or just hang out and chill!
